hypotheses.hypothesis: [MOCK] Videos with emotional hooks in the first 3 seconds achieve 5x higher viral potential regardless of category
supporting_evidence: 92% of viral videos analyzed had clear emotional triggers within first 3 seconds
Non-viral videos averaged 8.2 seconds before emotional engagement
Cross-category pattern observed in beauty, tech, and lifestyle content
hypotheses.test_recommendation: A/B test ads with emotional hook vs. product-first opening

hypotheses.hypothesis: [MOCK] User-generated content style outperforms polished production in authentic engagement
supporting_evidence: UGC-style videos had 2.3x higher comment rates
Overly polished content perceived as 'too ad-like'
Trend consistent across Gen Z and Millennial audiences
hypotheses.test_recommendation: Create 'raw' version of polished ad creative

hypotheses.hypothesis: [MOCK] Problem-solution narrative structure drives higher completion rates
supporting_evidence: Viral videos using problem-solution format had 87% avg completion rate
Linear product showcase videos averaged 34% completion
hypotheses.test_recommendation: Restructure ads to lead with relatable problem

hypotheses.hypothesis: [MOCK] Trending audio increases discoverability by 3-4x regardless of visual content quality
supporting_evidence: 78% of viral videos used trending audio
Algorithm prioritizes content with popular audio tracks
Audio-driven discovery accounts for 42% of viral reach
hypotheses.test_recommendation: Monitor trending audio and adapt creative quickly

universal_principles: üéØ [MOCK] Attention must be captured within 1-3 seconds
üéØ [MOCK] Clear value proposition in first frame
cross_category_hypotheses._note: ‚ö†Ô∏è THIS IS MOCK DATA - Replace with real Gemini-generated hypotheses

structure.0-3s: Emotional hook or shocking statement (e.g., 'I wasted $500 until I found this...')
structure.3-8s: Quick problem demonstration with relatable pain point

creative_elements: Close-up face shot in first frame
ad_formats.script_template: HOOK: 'Stop! I wish I knew this before spending $$$ on [problem]...' ‚Üí PROBLEM: Show frustration/pain ‚Üí SOLUTION: 'Then I found [product]' ‚Üí RESULT: Happy customer moment ‚Üí CTA: 'Link in bio for 20% off!'

structure.5-12s: Real-time product testing with genuine reaction

ad_formats.script_template: OPEN: 'Okay so I just got this and...' ‚Üí TEST: Actually use product on camera ‚Üí REACT: Genuine surprise/delight ‚Üí SHARE: 'Honestly didn't expect this but...' ‚Üí RECOMMEND: 'Definitely trying again'

PROBLEM: 'Anyone else struggling with [pain]?' ‚Üí STRUGGLE: Show multiple failed solutions ‚Üí DISCOVERY: 'Until I found this...' ‚Üí DEMO: Quick product demonstration ‚Üí TRANSFORMATION: 'Now I can finally...' ‚Üí OFFER: 'Get yours 30% off'

creative_briefs.objective: Drive awareness and consideration through emotional engagement
creative_briefs.target_audience: 25-40 year olds, problem-aware, active on social
avoid_elements: No corporate branding in first 5 seconds
creative_briefs.example_script: HOOK: 'I can't believe I'm about to show you this...' [shocked face close-up] ‚Üí 'So I've been dealing with [problem] for YEARS' [show frustration] ‚Üí 'Then my friend sent me this video' [transition] ‚Üí 'And honestly? Game changer.' [show product] ‚Üí 'Link in bio if you need this in your life' [genuine smile]

testing_framework.phase_1_discovery: Test 3-5 variations of hook styles with same product
testing_framework.phase_2_validation: Scale winning hook format across product line
testing_framework.phase_3_optimization: A/B test CTA placement and audio choices
